Voici ci-dessous l exemple de Wilson:
Voici votre matrice initialisee :
   x1                     x2              x3              x4              ╬╗
1 10.0000000000000000 7.0000000000000000 8.0000000000000000 7.0000000000000000 32.0000000000000000
2 7.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 6.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 23.0000000000000000
3 8.0000000000000000 6.0000000000000000 10.0000000000000000 9.0000000000000000 33.0000000000000000
4 7.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 9.0000000000000000 10.0000000000000000 31.0000000000000000

1e etape :
   x1                     x2              x3              x4              ╬╗
1 10.0000000000000000 7.0000000000000000 8.0000000000000000 7.0000000000000000 32.0000000000000000
2 0.0000000000000004 0.1000000000000003 0.4000000000000004 0.1000000000000003 0.6000000000000014
3 8.0000000000000000 6.0000000000000000 10.0000000000000000 9.0000000000000000 33.0000000000000000
4 7.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 9.0000000000000000 10.0000000000000000 31.0000000000000000

2e etape :
   x1                     x2              x3              x4              ╬╗
1 10.0000000000000000 7.0000000000000000 8.0000000000000000 7.0000000000000000 32.0000000000000000
2 0.0000000000000004 0.1000000000000003 0.4000000000000004 0.1000000000000003 0.6000000000000014
3 -0.0000000000000004 0.3999999999999997 3.5999999999999996 3.3999999999999995 7.3999999999999986
4 7.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 9.0000000000000000 10.0000000000000000 31.0000000000000000

3e etape :
   x1                     x2              x3              x4              ╬╗
1 10.0000000000000000 7.0000000000000000 8.0000000000000000 7.0000000000000000 32.0000000000000000
2 0.0000000000000004 0.1000000000000003 0.4000000000000004 0.1000000000000003 0.6000000000000014

4 0.0000000000000004 0.1000000000000003 3.4000000000000004 5.1000000000000005 8.6000000000000014

4e etape :
   x1                     x2              x3              x4              ╬╗
1 10.0000000000000000 7.0000000000000000 8.0000000000000000 7.0000000000000000 32.0000000000000000

5e etape :
   x1                     x2              x3              x4              ╬╗
1 10.0000000000000000 7.0000000000000000 8.0000000000000000 7.0000000000000000 32.0000000000000000
2 -0.0000000000000004 0.3999999999999997 3.5999999999999996 3.3999999999999995 7.3999999999999986

6e etape :
   x1                     x2              x3              x4              ╬╗
1 10.0000000000000000 7.0000000000000000 8.0000000000000000 7.0000000000000000 32.0000000000000000
2 -0.0000000000000004 0.3999999999999997 3.5999999999999996 3.3999999999999995 7.3999999999999986
3 0.0000000000000006 -0.0000000000000000 2.4999999999999969 4.2499999999999973 6.7499999999999947
4 0.0000000000000007 -0.0000000000000000 -0.0000000000000000 0.1000000000000028 0.1000000000000034

Les reponses sont:
x1 = 0.9999999999999748 x2 = 1.0000000000000417 x3 = 0.9999999999999896 x4 = 1.0000000000000062

Les mineurs principaux sont:
m1 = 10.0000000000000000        m2 = 0.3999999999999997 m3 = 2.4999999999999969 m4 = 0.1000000000000028
